resources.string: Tip: only card titles are mandatory

Version 0.12 
 With expansion, I'm adding translations little by little. Default is english.

 Found a bug (highly possible with the expansion) ? 
Translation missing and you want to contribute ? 

Contact me (link in play store)
Bonus: +10 for each Land; Clears the word Army from Penalty section of all cards in hand
Bonus: +5 if no Weather in hand
Penalty: -8 unless with at least one Leader
Clears the Penalty sections on all cards in hand
Bonus: +50 if every active card in hand is a different suit
Bonus: you may change the suit of one other card. Its name, bonuses and penalties remain the same.
Bonus: +15 with any one Leader, +40 with both Leader and Sword of Keth
Bonus: +10 for 3-card run, +30 for 4-card run, +60 for 5-card run, +100 for 6-card run, +150 for 7-card run
Bonus: +14 with any Leader or Wizard
Bonus: +30 with Princess, +15 with Empress, Queen, or Elemental Enchantress
Penalty: -40 unless with at least one Wizard
Penalty: Blanks all Armies, Leaders, and other Beasts
Bonus: +100 with Book of Changes, Bell Tower, and any one Wizard
Bonus: +9 for each Weapon and Artifact
Blanks all cards except Flames, Weather, Wizards, Weapons, Artifacts, Great Flood, Island, Mountain, Unicorn, Dragon
Bonus: Add the base strength of any Weapon, Flood, Flame, Land, or Weather in your hand
Clears the Penalty on any one Flood or Flame
Penalty: Blanks all Armies, all Land except Mountain, all Flames except Lightning
Bonus: +25 with Dwarvish Infantry or Dragon; Clears the Penalty on all Weather
Bonus: +12 for each Beast and Elven Archers
Bonus: +50 with both Smoke and Wildfire; Clears the Penalty on all Floods
Bonus: +8 for each Army, Wizard, and other Leader
Bonus: Equal to the base strengths of all Armies in your hand
Bonus: +5 for each Army, +20 for each Army if in the same hand with King
Bonus: +5 for each Army, +20 for each Army if in the same hand with Queen
Bonus: +10 for each Army; Penalty: -5 for each other leader
Bonus: +30 with Elven Archers or Warlord or Beastmaster
Bonus: +10 with any one Leader, +40 with both Leader and Shield of Keth
Penalty: Blanked unless with at least one Flood; Clears the word Army from Penalty section of all Floods
Penalty: Blanked unless with at least one Army, Blanked if hand contains any weather
Bonus: +10 for each Flood; Penalty: Blanks all Flames except Lightning
Bonus: +40 with Rainstorm and either Blizzard or Great Flood
Penalty: This card is blanked unless with at least one Flame
Penalty: Blanks all Floods, -5 for each Army, Leader, Beast, and Flame
May take on the name and suit of any Artifact, Leader, Wizard, Weapon or Beast. Does not take bonus or penalty.
May take on the name and suit of any Army, Land, Weather, Flood or Flame. Does not take bonus or penalty.
May duplicate the name, suit, base strength, and penalty but not bonus of any one other card in your hand
Bonus: At the end of the game, you may take one Army, Leader, Wizard, or Beast from the discard pile and add it to your hand as an eighth card.
Bonus: +5 for each Land, Weather, Flood, and Flame
Bonus: +10 if three different cards in same suit, +40 if four different cards, +100 if five different cards
Bonus: +9 for each Beast; Clears the Penalty on all Beasts
Penalty: -10 for each Leader and other Wizard
BONUS: +10 each for the first Undead, Beast, and Artifact. +5 for each additional card in any of these suits and Necromancer, Warlock Lord, Demon.
BONUS: +10 for the first Leader, Army, Land, and other Building. +5 for each additional Building.
BONUS: The sum of the base strength of all Undead. PENALTY: BLANKs all Leaders.
BONUS: +40 if you have exactly two cards from among these suits: Leader, Wizard, Outsider, and Undead.
BONUS: +11 for each Leader and Beast.
BONUS: +10 per other player, At the end of the game, look through the draw deck and put one card in your hand. (Resolves after Leprechaun.)
BONUS: +10 for each card that contains a card with a Penalty not CLEARED.
Prevent one other card from being BLANKED. This card can never be BLANKED.
BONUS: Draw the top card from the deck at the end of the game and add it to your hand. (Resolves before Genie.)
PENALTY: For every non-Outsider card : If that card is the only card you have in that suit, then that card is BLANKED. This takes place before any other BLANKING.
BONUS: +5 for each Land, Flood, Flame, Weather, and Unicorn in the discard area.
BONUS: +4 for each Wizard, Leader, Army, Beast, and Undead in the discard area.
BONUS: +6 for each Wizard, Artifact, and Outsider in the discard area.
BONUS: +10 for Necromancer and each other Undead. Undead may not be BLANKED.
BONUS: +7 for each Weapon and Army in the discard area.
BONUS: +15 with any one Wizard or Undead.
BONUS: Add the base strength of any one Building, Weapon, Flood, Flame, Land or Weather in your hand.
PENALTY: BLANKS all Armies, all Buildings, all Lands except Mountain, and all Flames except Lightning.
BONUS: +10 for each Land and Building. CLEARS the word Army from all Penalties.
BONUS: At the end of the game, you may take one Army, Leader, Wizard, Beast, or Undead from the discard pile and add it to your hand. Undead may not be blanked.
BONUS: +70 if every non-BLANKED card is a different suit.

BONUS: Shapeshifter may duplicate the name and suit of any one Artifact, Leader, Wizard, Weapon, Beast, or Undead in the game. Does not take the bonus, penalty, or base strength of the card duplicated.
BONUS: Mirage may duplicate the name and suit of any one Army, Building, Land, Weather, Flood or Flame in the game. Does not take the bonus, penalty, or base strength of the card duplicated.
ANY TIME: Look at another player’s hand. (*This item’s base value is -10 in 2-player game)
REPLACE TURN: Take the top card from the deck and place it directly in the discard area, then end your turn. \n(The makeup of your hand will not change this turn.)
REPLACE TURN: Reverse normal turn order: discard a card first, then draw a card from the deck.
ANY TIME: Look at the bottom seven cards of the deck, then replace them there.
ANY TIME: Name a suit. All other players must reveal all cards they possess of that suit.

REPLACE TURN: Reveal a card from your hand. Any other player may reveal up to 3 cards to offer in exchange. \n You may choose to trade your card for one of them; if no offer is acceptable, keep your card or discard it and draw from the deck.
ANY TIME: Draw three Cursed Items and set them aside face up. \nThe next three times you would draw a new Cursed Item from the deck, you must take one of these cards instead.
ANY TIME: Put a card from the discard area on the bottom of the deck.

ANY TIME: Cover two cards in the discard area with this card. They still count towards the end of the game and give bonuses to Undead, but no one but you may take them, and they are immune to Shovel and Gold Mirror.
ANY TIME: You may peek at the top card of the deck before deciding whether to draw from the deck or discard area.
ANY TIME: Steal a face-up Cursed Item from another player. You must use it immediately. \nThe player you stole from must immediately draw a replacement from the Cursed Item deck.
ANY TIME: Take one of the top three discarded Cursed Item cards and play it immediately.
ANY TIME: Put the top card of the deck directly into the discard area.
REPLACE TURN: Return 3–8 cards from your hand to the bottom of the deck and replace them from the top of the deck.
REPLACE TURN: Draw two cards from the discard area, then discard two cards.
ANY TIME: Worth +25 points at the end of the game if you have at least three other Cursed Items facedown.
REPLACE TURN: Draw two cards from the deck, then discard any two cards.

COPY TIMING OF COPIED CARD: Copy the ability of any Cursed Item you have already played other than Backpack, Sarcophagus, Blindfold, and Treasure Chest. \nDiscard and redraw if you have no facedown Cursed Items.
AFTER TURN: Take an extra turn. Do not replace this card with a new Cursed Item until after your second turn.
ANY TIME: Put three cards from the discard area on the bottom of the deck. \nReplace them with the top three cards of the deck.
REPLACE TURN: Instead of drawing a card from the deck, draw three cards, then place two of them on the top or bottom of the deck (or one each) before you discard normally.

REPLACE TURN: Name a suit. Draw from the deck until you draw a card from that suit, or until you have drawn ten cards. (Wild cards do not count.) \nIf you draw a card from the named suit, keep it and discard a different card from your hand. \nShow the other cards you drew and reshuffle them into the deck.
ANY TIME: Skip your discard phase this turn. \n(You will have one extra card in your hand from now on.)
ANY TIME: Look through the deck and place any card you wish on top. \n(You may do this immediately before you draw.) \nReshuffle the deck at the end of your turn.
BONUS: +3 for each other card with an odd base strength value OR +50 if entire hand has odd base strength values.
